ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Is this list still alive?
ygData.msgSnippet: I dunno, i do agree that Furor is somewhat overexaggerating. But if you look at AO just prerelease, there were people complaining about the problems with its
ygData.messageBody:
I dunno, i do agree that Furor is somewhat overexaggerating. But if you look
at AO just prerelease, there were people complaining about the problems with
its fundamentals which were shot down by the fanbois then. This just appear
to me to be the same thing happening all over again.

All i can say is, even if there are problems, even fundamental ones, they
can be fixed, but only within a certain time window (witness the AO 12.6
decable for a good example of exceeding that time window). Only time will
tell.

And this list does seem very dead. Ziltus you should consider just closing
it down :D

----- Original Message -----
From: "K. W. Lee" <kw.lee@...>
To: <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 26, 2001 9:15 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Is this list still alive?


> Yes, similar post has been put up in DAOC Vault forum DAOC fans supporters
> fighting back. Anyway everyone know FOH is EQ's pet, I won't be surprised
> if they can only see the bad stuffs. Check the forum thread in SG-DAOC
> forum, I put it up 1-2 days ago :)
>
> Enjoy reading, hehe.
>
> On 25 September, 2001 7:27 PM, Andrew Lam [SMTP:draco@...]
> wrote:
> > guess what? www.noows.com
> >
> > FoH hates DAoC heh :)
> > Their message board is a very interesting read of what Furor has to say
> > about DAoC.
